title: (x) "Syst3m" similar to Gill Sans Display - Base 12 Serif {Eric Gordon}
content:
Ahoy! I’ve been trying to identify this font for quite some time. Hopefully you guys can help. It’s simillar to Gill Sans Display, but not quite. In the image attached it’s the typeface that says “syst3m”, but it does not have those vertical lines in it. That’s something the designer seems to have added. If it rings a bell please let me know! Thanks -Derek

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142618im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/syst3m_6387.jpg)

author: etx

comments.content: You Sir, are my hero! Thanks!
